name: Organic Agave In The Raw Agave Nectar, 18.5 oz., Made With Blue Agave From Mexico, USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher Vegan and Low Glycemic Index
short_description: ORGANIC AGAVE SWEETENER: Enjoy your sweet moments. With notes of caramel and a deep amber color, Organic Agave In The Raw is perfect for all your sweetening needs.

A HEALTHY SUGAR ALTERNATIVE: Made with 100% raw blue agave nectar hand-harvested in Jalisco Mexico from agave plants free from pesticides and antibiotics. USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, kosher, plant-based and low glycemic index.

A BETTER WAY TO DRIZZLE: Organic Agave In The Raw is great for sweetening your morning coffee, oatmeal or yogurt. It makes a great topping and you can bake or cook with it too. Use it in cocktails or mocktails to add a touch of sweetness.

SWEETER THAN SUGAR: Organic Agave In The Raw is about 25% sweeter than sugar so a little can go a long way. The organic agave nectar blends easily in beverages and helps to moisten and brown when baking.

NO NONSENSE, JUST NATURAL SWEETENERS: Founded in 1970 when we began the search for a less processed sugar, In The Raw has 50+ years of sweetener expertise. Today, we offer a variety of versatile sweeteners plucked from the earth for every occasion.
product_description: Enjoy your sweet moments with Organic Agave In The Raw, a sugar alternative made from the core of Mexico's blue agave plant. Hand-harvested and heated at a low temperature to bring out the pure, rich flavor, our organic agave nectar blends easily in beverages, makes a great topping and helps to moisten and brown when baking. Sweeten your morning coffee or evening cocktail, drizzle it on oatmeal or use it to top yogurt. USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, kosher, vegan and low glycemic index. We’re a sweetener family. Since we launched our iconic brown packets in 1970, we’ve been focused on one thing, and one thing only, scouring the globe to bring you the finest quality sweeteners that nature has to offer. From turbinado to honey, stevia to agave, we proudly stand as the leading go-to brand for anyone looking to naturally sweeten any moment.

name: Madhava Organic Amber Agave, 46 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 2)
short_description: ORGANIC AGAVE NECTAR—TASTE THE DIFFERENCE: Pour a drop of our delicious organic blue agave nectar with this pack of 2, 46-ounce bottles of MADHAVA Organic Amber Agave
INDEPENDENTLY AWARDED FOR PURITY: Continuously tested by The Clean Label Project to verify our agave nectar is always contaminant-free.Store at room temperature
AUTHENTIC BLUE AGAVE: 100% Weber Blue Agave, direct from organic agave farms
SUSTAINABLY HARVESTED AGAVE NECTAR: Our agave is grown and harvested in partnership with non GMO and organic blue agave farmers who share our values of doing good for people and the earth
CLEAN & SIMPLE: Our organic blue agave nectar is USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher, gluten-free and vegan, and is packed in BPA free bottles with pourable cap

MULTI-USE LIQUID SWEETENER: Replace corn syrup, brown rice syrup and molasses with low-glycemic MADHAVA agave nectar—it's a delicious agave sweetener for tea, coffee and recipes! Use agave as a sugar alternative to replace other syrups and sugars
AGAVE USAGE TIP: Use 50% less organic agave nectar than other syrups

PASSION FOR PURITY: MADHAVA started making honey in 1973 and although honey will always be our first love, we’ve made room for other clean and simple organic food like agave nectar, coconut sugar, extra virgin olive oil and culinary vinegars
product_description: MADHAVA Organic Agave is sourced directly from non GMO and organic agave farmers who share our values of doing good for people and the earth. All of our organic agave nectar products are made with organic ingredients crafted to bring out the best flavors as nature intended. It's just, agave. When MADHAVA started making honey in 1973, we were shocked that food companies tinker and toil with synthetic formulas, trying to re-create authentic flavors. We knew there was a better way. So, we ventured into deserts in Mexico, climbed trees in California, and sapped flowers in Asia – in an obsessive pursuit of purity. As our company has evolved since 1973, so has our passion for purity in all foods. It’s now our mission to get clean ingredients to tables across the country – and the world. In our pursuit of purity, we’ve partnered with the Clean Label Project to double and triple check that our MADHAVA methods prevent environmental and industrial contaminants from getting in, resulting in natural, organic, rich flavors you can trust. Every MADHAVA product is Clean Label Project certified and continuously tested for hundreds of toxins and contaminants.

name: Wholesome FT Organic Blue Agave 11.75oz, 1-Pack
short_description: DELICIOUSLY SWEET INGREDIENTS: Wholesome Organic Blue Agave Nectar is 100% pure, minimally processed and contains one simple ingredient.
USAGE: Our organic agave nectar is 25% sweeter than sugar. We love it in cocktails and mocktails, as well as in baking and drizzling on top of breakfast treats.
SOURCING: Our organic agave nectar is sustainably grown and harvested in Mexico. Juice from the pina is then heated, filtered and bottled.
CERTIFIABLE QUALITY: USDA Organic, Fair Trade Certified, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher Certified, Gluten Free, and Vegan
WHOLESOME MISSION: At Wholesome, we are on a mission to create positive meaningful change by bringing bakers, makers and farmers together through better food.
product_description: Wholesome! has been committed to organics and staying on the cutting edge of eco-friendly agriculture since its founding in 2001. Wholesome! is dedicated to Fair Trade and partners with caring farming families across the globe ensuring them a fair price for their crops. Since 2005, Wholesome! has paid more than $11 million in Fair Trade premiums to farming co-operatives and partners worldwide helping bring clean water, electricity, schools and health care to villages in Malawi, Mexico, Brazil and Paraguay.

name: Health Garden Blue Agave Nectar Sweetener - Organic - Non GMO - Low Glycemic - Kosher -11.6 oz
short_description: GREAT FOR COOKING AND BAKING: Agave nectar has been used for centuries in Mexico as a sweetener and valued by the natives for its medicinal properties. Agave nectar is 1.5 times sweeter than sugar or honey, so you can use less sweetener and enjoy the same level of sweetness. Try it and you’ll be amazed at the results!

LOW GLYCEMIC INDEX: Despite having the same amount of calories as regular sugar, agave nectar contains fructose rather than sucrose, placing it lower on the glycemic index. Agave nectar does not spike blood sugar levels in the same way table sugar does. In moderation, agave nectar is safe for diabetics and can help manage blood sugar levels. Recommended for use with low-carb and gluten-free diets, agave nectar

100% ALL NATURAL AND ORGANIC: Our agave nectar is delicious, organic, gluten-free and kosher with no harmful additives, or genetically modified ingredients. Rich in naturally-occurring nutrients and antioxidants, agave nectar contains no corn by-products and can be used as a substitute for high-fructose corn syrup.
AGAVE NECTAR CONVERSION RATE: 2/3 teaspoon agave nectar = 1 teaspoon sugar. 2/3 cup agave nectar = 1 cup sugar.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: We believe in our product and we think you will too! Contact us with any questions and we’ll be glad to help.

name: Amoretti - Premium Organic Amber Blue Agave Nectar (750 ml), with Pump for Flavoring Coffees, Cocktails, Iced Teas, Ice Cream, Marinades, Preservative Free, Non-GMO, Vegan, Gluten Free, Shelf Stable
short_description: VERSATILE FLAVOR: Our Agave Nectars are perfect for flavoring Iced Teas, Milkshakes, Smoothies, Italian sodas, Cocktails, Frappuccinos, Coffee, Tea, Hot Cocoa and as a Drizzle on Waffles, Pancakes, Ice Creams, Cupcakes and more!

PREMIUM QUALITY: Naturally wweetened with Organic Blue Agave Nectar, no preservatives, non-GMO, vegan, no sucrose, Kosher Pareve, and no artificial ingredients for a clean, natural taste in every pump.
BEST VALUE PER SERVING: Highly concentrated with 94 servings per 750ml bottle, delivering more flavor per pump than other brands.
SHELF-STABLE & CONVENIENT: Stays fresh even after opening, no refrigeration needed. Includes a free pump for effortless pouring.
PROFESSIONALLY CRAFTED: Handcrafted in Southern California, Certified Kosher, and TTB-approved.

name: Vanilla Bean Agave Simple Syrup for Coffee & Cocktails - Sweetened with Organic Agave Nectar - Infused with Real Vanilla Bean - 13.5 oz
short_description: 🍯 REAL AGAVE & VANILLA: Our vanilla simple syrup is sweetened with organic blue agave nectar and infused with real vanilla for an authentic and healthier alternative to traditional syrups. Tuturu is a superior simple syrup that will elevate any coffee drink or cocktail and give any drink an authentic vanilla bean taste.

☕ COFFEE & COCKTAILS: Great for making vanilla bean lattes and vanilla infused cocktails at home. Transform coffee, tea, lattes, matcha, cold brew, cocktails, mocktails, sodas, lemonade, oatmeal, and smoothies with Tuturu’s Simple Syrup. An authentic simple syrup that can be used to craft premium beverages at home for a fraction of the price.

✨ CLEAN LABEL: Simple ingredients. No artificial or "natural flavors" in our syrups. We only use real ingredients to sweeten and flavor our syrup. Allergen Free, Dairy Free, Gluten Free, No Processed Sugars, No Artificial Colors, No Artificial Flavors, No Artificial Ingredients, No Artificial Preservatives, No Artificial Sweeteners.

🫶 PREMIUM HAND-BREWED CRAFTSMANSHIP: We use cold water extraction to slowly infuse real vanilla flavor into our organic agave nectar for an elevated flavor you can only get from using real ingredients. Hand-brewed in San Diego with real vanilla and organic agave nectar, our syrup is a testament to elevating any recipe by using whole food ingredients with minimal processing.

name: WHOLESOME Organic Blue Agave Nectar, 18.5 OZ
short_description: DELICIOUSLY SWEET INGREDIENTS: Our Regenerative Organic Certified Blue Agave Nectar is 100% pure, minimally processed and contains one simple ingredient.
USAGE: Our Regenerative Organic Certified Agave Nectar is 25% sweeter than sugar. We love it in cocktails and mocktails, as well as in baking and drizzling on top of breakfast treats.

SOURCING: Our Regenerative Organic Certified Blue Agave Nectar is sourced from farms in Mexico using regenerative farming practices to help improve soil health, capture carbon and support the fair treatment of farm workers.

CERTIFIABLE QUALITY: Regenerative Organic Certified, USDA Organic, Fair Trade Certified, Non-GMO Project Verified, Kosher Certified, Gluten Free, and Vegan. It is packaged in a bottle made from 25% post consumer recylcled plastic.

WHOLESOME MISSION: At Wholesome, we are on a mission to create positive meaningful change by bringing bakers, makers and farmers together through better food. We believe everyone deserves All the Best - in your baking and making, for our farmers and for our planet. All the Best for All - That's Wholesome.
product_description: Wholesome Organic Blue Agave Nectar – 18.5 fl oz is a sustainably sourced, raw sweetener made from organically grown blue agave. This regenerative formula is minimally processed to preserve natural enzymes and nutrients, delivering a smooth, mild sweetness that’s perfect for beverages, baking, and cooking. Its convenient squeeze bottle makes it easy to measure and pour, while the raw, organic quality ensures a cleaner, plant-based alternative to refined sugars.
